data.title: Morning Market Gainers - Danaher (NYSE:DHR)
data.text:
ImmuCell Corporation ICCC shares jumped 27.04 percent to $7.18 after the company reported results for the first quarter. The company reported quarterly net income of $479,000, versus a net loss of $13,000. Williams Partners LP WPZ shares rose 23.52 percent to $58.55 after Williams Companies Inc announced a deal to purchase all public equity of Williams Partners LP. PDI, Inc. PDII rose 23.62 percent to $1.57. PDI reported Q1 loss of $0.25 per share on sales of $38.319 million. Rentrak Corporation RENT shares jumped 14.99 percent to $58.77. Rentrak reported Q4 sales of $28.5 million. TubeMogul Inc TUBE gained 12.37 percent to $17.34 after the company posted first quarter earnings and raised its guidance. TubeMogul reported a Q1 loss of $0.24 per share on revenue of $30.3 million. Alon Blue Square Israel Ltd BSI climbed 10.83 percent to $3.07 after the company announced the resignation of Mega Retail's Chief Executive Officer. Pain Therapeutics, Inc. PTIE shares rose 7.77 percent to $2.82 after jumping 35.05 percent on Tuesday. Hortonworks Inc HDP shares jumped 6.88 percent to $23.29 after the company reported a narrower-than-expected loss for the first quarter. Williams Companies Inc WMB shares rose 6.81 percent to $53.51 after the company announced a deal to purchase all public equity of Williams Partners LP and lifted its Q3 dividend from $0.58 to $0.64 per share. Pall Corporation PLL shares surged 4.96 percent to $124.50 after the company agreed to be acquired by Danaher Corporation for $127.20 per share in cash. Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated VRTX shares climbed 4.55 percent to $129.72 on news that a regulatory advisory committee recommended approval of its cystic fibrosis treatment called Orkambi. An FDA decision is expected by July 5. Danaher Corporation DHR shares gained 3.07 percent to $88.64 after the company announced its plans to buy Pall Corp for $13.8 billion.
